name: Doge to the Moon!
description:
DOGE TO THE MOON

Simple mini game about a little-known meme. Press spacebar to load and launch. Streaks increase the price of Dogecoin (I've managed $4 once so far).

This is my second game and it was made start-to-finish over two days as a "Weekend Build." My pal Carl and I are making quick games like this to get off our asses and actually make things. You can check out his game Roadkill here. 

If you want to see some behind the scenes for some reason, we'll be sharing a video to our new YouTube channel soon. 

Anyway, in all seriousness, thank you for stopping by. I hope you like it.

- Jason
